trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection> class provides a collection-based wrapper over a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo> instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection>類別提供一組以集合為基礎的包裝函式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: These instances are retrieved by iterating sequentially over the collection, by ordinal index or by key value.
trans-unit.target: 透過循序逐一查看集合、 序數索引或索引鍵值，則會擷取這些執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Instances are indexed on a combination of path and user name.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體進行索引的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo> instances representing shared data are indexed according to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo.Path%2A> object, whereas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo> instances are indexed according to both a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo.Path%2A> object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.Username%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 這是必要的因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo>代表共用的資料的執行個體進行索引根據<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo.Path%2A>物件，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo>執行個體根據索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo.Path%2A>物件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.Username%2A>物件。

trans-unit.source: The information objects are maintained in the collection in the order in which they were received from the provider.
trans-unit.target: 資訊的物件會保留在集合中的提供者所接收的順序。

trans-unit.source: The collection does not attempt to change the order of the instances or maintain a specific sort order within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合不會嘗試變更順序的執行個體或維護集合中特定的排序次序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會初始化空的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" />-derived instance to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> 衍生執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" />-derived instance to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> 衍生執行個體加入至集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo>-derived instance to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo>-衍生執行個體的集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: Internally, the count of the collection is incremented by one.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，集合的計數會遞增一。

trans-unit.source: Any enumerators currently active against the collection are invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 任何目前作用中，針對集合的列舉程式就會失效。

trans-unit.source: The collection was marked as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 集合已標示為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to add an object to the collection when an instance of the same shared or per-user state already exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當集合中已存在相同的共用或個別使用者狀態執行個體時，嘗試將物件加入集合。

trans-unit.source: The data parameter is null.
trans-unit.target: 資料參數為 null。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of all items.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: Any enumerators currently active against the collection are invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 任何目前作用中，針對集合的列舉程式就會失效。

trans-unit.source: The collection was marked as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 集合已標示為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The array the elements in the collection are copied into.
trans-unit.target: 集合的元素複製到的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The location at which to start the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 開始複製作業的位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> collection into a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> array, starting at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> 集合的元素複製到以指定位置為起始點的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you want to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo> array.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要建立使用這個方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo>陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method simply calls the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and passes the `array` and `index` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會呼叫<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，並傳遞`array`和`index`參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The count of the items in the collection can be used to iterate through the collection, as shown in the example.
trans-unit.target: 集合中項目的計數可用來逐一查看集合，如範例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.Count%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a standard enumerator capable of iterating over the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可以逐一查看集合的標準列舉值。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，可用於逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> method also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>方法也會列舉值帶回至這個位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 此位置<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>未定義屬性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information on enumerators, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關列舉值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出對 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> 集合的存取是否為同步 (具備執行緒安全)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the collection is synchronized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果對集合的存取是同步處理的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The value is always <see langword="false" /> for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> objects created by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 該值對於 Web 組件控制項集合建立的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> 物件來說一定是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.SyncRoot%2A> 屬性會傳回物件，這個物件可用來同步處理對 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection> 的存取。

trans-unit.source: Gets an element from the collection based on the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 會根據指定的參數從集合取得項目。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal index of the object to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的物件循序索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> instance located at the specified ordinal index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中位在指定循序索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> instance located at the specified ordinal index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中位在指定循序索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This property retrieves the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo> instance located at the specified ordinal index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo>執行個體位於集合中的指定序數索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大於 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: The relative application path of the personalization state object to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的個人化狀態物件之相對應用程式路徑。

trans-unit.source: The user name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo" /> object to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo" /> 物件的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets an element from the collection based on the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 會根據指定的參數從集合取得項目。

trans-unit.source: An element from the collection based on the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 集合中根據指定之參數的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property is the default indexer for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是集合的預設索引子。

trans-unit.source: If only `path` is provided, the property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有`path`提供，則屬性會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If both `path` and `username` are provided, the property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo> instance for the combination of `path` and `username`.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個`path`和`username`提供，則屬性會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo>組合的執行個體`path`和`username`。

trans-unit.source: If `path` (in the case that `username` is set to `null`) does not exist, or if `username` and `path` do not exist, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`(案例中，`username`設`null`) 不存在，或如果`username`和`path`不存在，`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The relative application path of the personalization state object to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的個人化狀態物件之相對應用程式路徑。

trans-unit.source: The user name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo" />-derived object to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo" /> 衍生物件的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" />-derived object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合移除 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> 衍生物件。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo>-derived instance from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo>-衍生自集合的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Any elements after the removed instance are moved up to occupy the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 移除執行個體之後的任何項目會往上移動以佔用空的位置。

trans-unit.source: Internally, the count of the collection is decremented by one.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，將集合的計數會減一。

trans-unit.source: Any enumerators currently active against the collection are invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 任何目前作用中，針對集合的列舉程式就會失效。

trans-unit.source: If only `path` is provided, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo> instance for that path is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有`path`提供，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo>也會移除該路徑為執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If both `path` and `username` are provided, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo> instance for the combination of `path` and `username` is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個`path`和`username`提供，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo>組合的執行個體`path`和`username`已移除。

trans-unit.source: You can try to remove a non-existing item from the collection; this action will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 您可以嘗試從集合中，移除不存在的項目此動作將不會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The collection was marked as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 集合已標示為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 null。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
both parameters are null.
trans-unit.target: 兩個參數都是 Null。

trans-unit.source: Marks the collection as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 將集合標示為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Methods that attempt to modify a read-only collection, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.Remove%2A>, throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 方法嘗試修改唯讀的集合，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.Add%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.Remove%2A>，會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.SetReadOnly%2A> method multiple times on the collection; this will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.SetReadOnly%2A>多次集合上的方法; 這將會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用來對 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> 同步存取的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用以同步存取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set returns a reference to the current collection object.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項集合會傳回目前集合物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide their own synchronized versions of the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本的集合使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.SyncRoot%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.SyncRoot%2A> of the collection, not directly on the collection itself.
trans-unit.target: 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.SyncRoot%2A>集合的一部分，不是直接在集合本身。

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance.
trans-unit.target: 特別是可以與其他可能同時修改集合執行個體的執行緒，保持正常的同步處理。

trans-unit.source: The array into which a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> objects will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> 物件集合複製到其中的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The point in <c>array</c> at which to start copying the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中要開始複製 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo" /> 物件的點。

trans-unit.source: Implements the base <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作基底 <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method, like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection> class's own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.CopyTo%2A> method, simply calls the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and passes the `array` and `index` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法類似<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection>類別自己<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法，只會呼叫<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，並傳遞`array`和`index`參數。
